metadata.title: CVE-2019-17015 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description: During the initialization of a new content process, a pointer offset can bemanipulated leading to memory corruption and a potentially exploitablecrash in the parent process. *Note: this issue only occurs on Windows.Other operating systems are unaffected.*. This vulnerability affectsFirefox ESR < 68.4 and Firefox < 72.

criterions.comment: mozjs52 package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
